entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.dll is missing building runtime/libs with VS2022 #62064
  • Interop ComWrappersTests failures #62063
  • Stream.ReadLineAsync is 6 times slower than Stream.ReadLine in .NET 6 #62061
  • UnwindManagedExceptionPass1 crashes on virtual dispatch stub when handling System.NullReferenceException on macOS ARM64 #62058
  • Analyzer/fixer proposal: Collapse multiple `Path.Combine` or `Path.Join` in a row #62057
  • Blazor WASM crashes after a time with Assertion: should not be reached at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/../sgen/sgen-scan-object.h:91 558006 @ dotnet.6.0.0.csqdfrwtlv.js:1 #62054
  • [mono][bug] mono_alc_from_gchandle return wrong value? #62052
  • `DispatchProxy` cannot work with types from collectible assemblies. #62050
  • Forward substitution for relops can create new data races #62048
  • Found conflicts between different versions of "System.Security.Principal.Windows" that could not be resolved. #62044
  • Deadlock with SystemEvents when application is shutdown by Restart Manager #62042
  • JIT doesn't inline methods contain EH code #62038
  • PrincipalContext.Dispose() does not dispose LdapConnection(s) used by PrincipalContext.ValidateCredentials() #62035
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.Directory_Delete_str_bool.Unix_NotFoundDirectory_ReadOnlyVolume #62034
  • Remove Spaces from GitHub Labels #62032
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Directed/debugging/debuginfo/tester/tester.sh #62031

Closed

  • DriveInfo tests fail if current user uses SUBST #14027
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support for MultiSet & MultiMap in System.Collections.Generic #61892
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\debugging\\poisoning\\poison\\poison.cmd #62033
  • coreclr_initialize returns 0x80070057 on Windows when using '/' directory separators #13195
    Future
  • [Bug] MAUI templates crashing on iOS (Foundation.NSMutableData:AppendBytes) #61153
    6.0.x
  • Add RequiresDynamicCodeAttribute #61239
    7.0.0
  • comma as decimal stopped working #60938
  • Logger Generator not able to Resolve Generic Type Constraints #62026
  • EnvironmentVariablesConfigurationProvider not load connection string prefix POSTGRESQLCONNSTR_ on Azure AppService #57545
    7.0.0
  • X509v3 Subject Alternative Name DirName #61998
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix miscellaneous typos #62062
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #62059
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Exclude a newly added test on Mono #62056
  • [mono][interp] Remove hack for nint/nfloat #62053
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Flip IL offset check #62049
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • #61971 - Fix a bug causing EventCounter to fire twice on linux #62047
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Add Browsable Attribute support. #62045
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Stop marking volatile indirections as `NO_CSE` #62043
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • make sure OpenSSL is initialized before Tls13Supported code runs #62037
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Dispose LdapConnections used by PrincipalContext.ValidateCredentials #62036
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution

Merged

  • Re-enable Windows test that verifies DriveInfo.VolumeLabel setter fails on SUBST'd drive #59850
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Integration of changes in shared files from runtimelab/NativeAOT #62039
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add a github action to sync shared source from aspnetcore #61999
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono][interp] Fix handing of native types #61612
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] debug with modularized runtime(s) #61848
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Update path of disabled test that was moved #62051
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • Fix FileSystemAclExtensions.Create when passing a null FileSecurity #61297
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • PE loader/image investigations #61938
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Suppress trim warning caused by recent attribute removal changes #62023
    area-System.ComponentModel, linkable-framework, 7.0.0
  • Remove string allocation from XmlTextEncoder.WriteCharEntity #61774
    area-System.Xml, needs more info, community-contribution
  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • WIP: first group project for type generator tests 0-99 #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Stepping into hidden function. #61312
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Don't merge CI test only] #61970
  • Support Process.Start() on MacCatalyst #61507
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Build HttpStress and SslStress with live-built runtime using current TFM #61689
    area-System.Net
  • CI matrix change: add Windows.Server.Core.20H2 - Second attempt #60054
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Use cross origin policy headers #62016
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • CI matrix update: add Ubuntu 21.04 - second attempt #60162
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: add Windows Server 2022 #60163
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: Add OSX 12 arm #59085
    blocked, area-Infrastructure
  • CI matrix: add openSUSE 15.2 - second attempt #60161
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [JIT] [Issue: 61620] Optimizing ARM64 for *x = dblCns; #61847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Feature/get debug view value processing #60391
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Reduce allocations in code generated by Logging generators (#61162) #62011
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [Mono] Fix support for nested structs with explicit layout #61467
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono]mono_runtime_delegate_invoke change to gc unsafe state #62003
    community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Fix and optimize llvmonly+gsharedvt code generation #61117
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add zlib-ng library, optimized for ARM64 #61883
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Start building a universal System.Linq.Expressions library #61952
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Use workloads to run AOT tests #61863
    arch-wasm
  • fix for excessive gen0 in high memory load situation #61884
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix setting pipe used in PAL_ProbeMemory as nonblocking #61126
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
